Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Enjoy a day in the sun at the natural Es Trenc Beach or the popular Playa de Palma Beach.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Relax at the Spa Son Antem, featuring a thermal indoor/outdoor pool, steam rooms and more.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Explore the Bellver Castle in Palma, a classic example of 14th-century medieval architecture.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Visit the popular limestone caves of Mallorca: Artá, Campanet, Génova, Cuevas del Drach, and Hams.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Enjoy access to 36 holes of golf at the Mallorca Marriott® Son Antem Golf Resort and Spa.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Try your luck at the Grand Casino Mallorca, the island's only casino.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Our charming Llucmajor townhouses are ideally located on the majestic Spanish island of Mallorca offering beautiful views.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: Elegantly appointed and spacious two- and three-bedroom townhouses accommodate up to eight guests.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: During your stay with us, enjoy beautiful pools, a full service spa, golf and more!

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Spacious two- and three-bedroom Mallorca family resort townhouses accommodate up to eight guests.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Fully equipped kitchens feature cookware and tableware so you can easily prepare fresh meals.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Our Mallorca family resort's townhouses offer living and dining areas with all the comforts of home.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Master suites have a king-size bed, a hydrotherapy tub, premium bedding and charming decor.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Private balconies, terraces with grills and scenic resort views offer entertainment and relaxation.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: At this resort, Mallorca rainy days are made better with flat screen satellite TVs and DVD players.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Spacious two- and three-bedroom Mallorca family resort townhouses accommodate up to eight guests.
Fully equipped kitchens feature cookware and tableware so you can easily prepare fresh meals.
Our Mallorca family resort's townhouses offer living and dining areas with all the comforts of home.
Master suites have a king-size bed, a hydrotherapy tub, premium bedding and charming decor.
Private balconies, terraces with grills and scenic resort views offer entertainment and relaxation.
At this resort, Mallorca rainy days are made better with flat screen satellite TVs and DVD players.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Off the eastern coast of Spain, Marriott's Club Son Antem is the ultimate representation of classic Mediterranean charm. Enjoy a stay in luxury two- and three-bedroom townhouses with all the comforts of home.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Off the Eastern coast of Spain, situated among rugged mountain cliffs and beautiful countryside, Marriott's Club Son Antem features luxury townhouses in Mallorca, representing the ultimate in Mediterranean charm. Featuring two- and three-bedroom luxury townhouses, you'll enjoy indoor and outdoor swimming pools, two on-site golf courses, a restaurant and bar, a full-service spa, and a fitness center. All of our Llucmajor, Mallorca, townhouses offer spacious floor plans with full kitchens and cookware, separate living and dining areas, private balconies or terraces with an outdoor grill, in-room entertainment and rich décor. Perfect for groups or families of up to eight, our stunning Mallorca townhouses offer the comfort and conveniences home. Just minutes from Palma de Mallorca Airport, Arenal and Estrenc Beaches, and Palma in the town of Llucmajor, Marriott's Club Son Antem is ideal for your next family holiday or romantic retreat.

Description.Text: Retreat to your two or three-bedroom townhouse in Mallorca

Description.Text: The spa pool will be closed for annual maintenance January 11-21, 2016. Some work activity and noise may be noticeable. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Your minimarket around the corner, with daily bakery, local food, wines & souvenirs. All you can need in one place near your Villa.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A place to relax in a rustic atmoshpere with natural and cozy surroundings. The restaurant offers traditional Majorcan and Mediterranean dishes.

Description.Name: Tour Day/Time Available
Description.Text: Go with a Segway, a unique experience in an incomparable setting around Palma and Playa de Palma.

Description.Name: Tour Day/Time Available
Description.Text: They offer various programmed taxi tours to the most interesting sites in Palma or Mallorca island.

Description.Name: Tour Day/Time Available
Description.Text: Island tours, events, tours in catamaran including lunch, hire speed boats, transfers in/out.

Attraction.AttractionName: The Super Yacht Cup Palma Regatta

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: From Palma International Airport: follow the signs to Playa De Palma/ Santanyi/ Llucmajor and take exit #20 at the sign Son Antem. At the round-about take the 2nd exit to the right and follow this small lane for about 1 km, parallel to the highway. At the Marriott Vacation Club sign turn right until you come through the security gate of the resort and continue following the signs to the reception located in front of the tennis courts on the left hand side.

Spa marketing description
Description.Text: Offering 3,000-square-meters of pure relaxation, Son Antem Spa at our premier Mallorca spa resort is a rejuvenating retreat. Escape within your senses courtesy of our refreshing hand and body treatments, relaxing massages, nail services and much more.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Unlimited Golf - special rates now available!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Enjoy unlimited golf, when staying 7 nights or more, with our exclusive rates for villa guests! Rates start from €239 Euros per week during low season. Please contact our on-site Golf team at +34 971 129 200 or email at mallorca.golfclub@vacationclub.com. (Terms and conditions apply)
